properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from North Beach to Drum Point MD; Eastern Bay; Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 16 at 2:44AM EST until January 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 25
kt expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay main channel north of Smith Point VA,
Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA, Eastern
Bay, Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank
River, and Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding
Bloodsworth Island.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to 6 AM
EST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM EST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY
